meanings: (위로) condolences, sympathy, (슬픔) mourning, sorrow, (formal) lamentation, (formal) lament, mourn

vlive.korean: 먹고 가는 애도 있어요? Some fish steal it? 듣기 View video fromis_9 : [THE100_fromis_9] 프롬이들의 첫 자유시간! 고기를 잡으러 바다로 갈까나~~ Ep. 10
'저런 애도 우리 학교에 있었냐?' "There's a kid like that at our school?" 듣기 View video BRANDNEWBOYS : 점심 같이 먹어요😋
vlive.english: "There's a kid like that at our school?"

vlive.korean: 애들이 '저런 애도 우리 학교에 있었냐?' The kids were like "There's a kid like that at our school?" 듣기 View video BRANDNEWBOYS : 점심 같이 먹어요😋
vlive.english: The kids were like "There's a kid like that at our school?"

vlive.korean: [우리 애도 (지숙 씨가) 추천해 주세요!] - 애기한테 잘 어울리는 거 - 애기 뭐 좋을까? [Please recommend one for him as well] - Something that looks good on him. - Which one? 듣기 View video 한뼘TV : [방판소년단 EP34] 지숙&B.P.S, 야구장에서 흠뻑 젖어버린 사연은?!
vlive.english: [Please recommend one for him as well] - Something that looks good on him. - Which one?

vlive.korean: 애도 아닌데. I'm not a child. 듣기 View video Chi Pu : [Chi Pu's Web Drama, Tỉnh Giấc Tôi Thấy Mình Trong Ai] "WAKE UP" EP 04

examples.korean: The whole country mourned her death. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 국가 전체가[온 국민이] 그녀의 죽음을 애도했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The whole country mourned her death. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Many will mourn her passing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 많은 사람들이 그 분이 떠나신[돌아가신] 것을 애도할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Many will mourn her passing. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a period of consultation / mourning / uncertainty 듣기 Add to Wordbook 상담[협의] 기간/애도 기간/불확실한 시기 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a period of consultation / mourning / uncertainty Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She was still in mourning for her husband. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 아직도 남편을 애도하고 있었다[남편 상중이었다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was still in mourning for her husband. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Today we mourn for all those who died in two world wars. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오늘 우리는 양차 세계 대전 때 돌아가신 모든 분들을 애도한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Today we mourn for all those who died in two world wars. Add to Wordbook
